Dear Parents,
Please note the primary house charity event (information was sent out at the end of last week) will now be taking place on Thursday 5th December, instead of Friday. If you have any items to donate then please send these in to upper school by Thursday 5th December.
Any questions then please contact at amanda.boby@bsg.org.cn.
Regards,
Amanda Boby
Community Action and Fundraising Coordinator
